Container.Name: Plains Of Pain
Container.Overview:
Docker image for the game Plains of Pain. The repo is based on the enshrouded-server repo made by mornedhels and uses supervisor to handle startup, automatic updates and cleanup.
ATTENTION: Please have a look at the README on [Github](https://github.com/traxo-xx/plainsofpain-server) get some info on how to generate the world files (currently this should be done under Windows) and general info on running this server.

Config.Name: Game Install Files
Config.Description: Container Path: /opt/plainsofpain - This contains the actual game installation and the auto-updater keeps the current version number of the game here.

Config.Name: World and Character Files
Config.Description: Container Path: /home/plainsofpain/.config/unity3d/CobraByteDigital/PlainsOfPain - This is where you have to put the generated world files. It will also contain files for characters when people play on the server.

Config.Name: SERVER_NAME
Config.Description: Container Variable: SERVER_NAME - The name of the server

Config.Name: SERVER_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Container Variable: SERVER_PASSWORD - The password for the server. Set this if you don't want your server to be open to everyone.

Config.Name: SERVER_SEED
Config.Description: Container Variable: SERVER_SEED - The seed with which you generated your world.

Config.Name: SERVER_WORLD_ID
Config.Description: Container Variable: SERVER_WORLD_ID - The world ID of your generated world.

Config.Name: SERVER_DIFFICULTY
Config.Description: Container Variable: SERVER_DIFFICULTY - The server's difficulty setting. (0 = Tourist, 1 = Rookies, 2 = True Wastelander, 3 = Veteran, 4 = Overlord)

Config.Name: SERVER_MAP_ID
Config.Description: Container Variable: SERVER_MAP_ID - ID of the map that should be used (0 = Wasteland v0.4, 1 = Dunes v0.4, 2 = Dunes v0.5)

Config.Name: SERVER_WORLD_SIZE
Config.Description: Container Variable: SERVER_WORLD_SIZE - Size of the server's map (3 = S, 5 = M, 7 = L, 9 = XL, 11 = XXL)

Config.Name: SERVER_SLOT_COUNT
Config.Description: Container Variable: SERVER_SLOT_COUNT - Max allowed concurrent players

Config.Name: SERVER_QUERYPORT
Config.Description: Container Variable: SERVER_QUERYPORT - The steam query port for the server. If you change this you will also have to change the respective Port configuration.

Config.Name: UPDATE_CRON
Config.Description: Container Variable: UPDATE_CRON - Update game server files cron (eg. '*/30 * * * *' to check for updates every 30 minutes)

Config.Name: UPDATE_CHECK_PLAYERS
Config.Description: Container Variable: UPDATE_CHECK_PLAYERS - Should the auto-update check if someone is connected.

Config.Name: GAME_BRANCH
Config.Description: Container Variable: GAME_BRANCH - Steam branch (eg. testing) of the Plains of Pain server

Config.Name: STEAMCMD_ARGS
Config.Description: Container Variable: STEAMCMD_ARGS - Additional steamcmd args for the updater
